scgraph
  • Reference
  • News

Convert to tidygraph.

Convert to tidygraph.

# S3 method for PRIMITIVE
as_tbl_graph(x, ...)

# S3 method for sf
as_tbl_graph(x, ...)

Arguments

x

model
...

other args

Examples

library(tidygraph)
library(scgraph)
data("minimal_mesh", package = "silicate")
as_tbl_graph(minimal_mesh)
#> # A tbl_graph: 14 nodes and 16 edges
#> #
#> # A directed simple graph with 2 components
#> #
#> # Node Data: 14 x 3 (active)
#>       name     x     y
#>      <chr> <dbl> <dbl>
#> 1 5af51ccb  0.69  0.00
#> 2 1bd07013  0.80  0.60
#> 3 be2b724e  1.10  0.63
#> 4 20c4b41f  1.23  0.30
#> 5 ac59a685  0.00  0.00
#> 6 dc0389d4  0.00  1.00
#> # ... with 8 more rows
#> #
#> # Edge Data: 16 x 4
#>    from    to     path segment_
#>   <int> <int>    <chr>    <chr>
#> 1     1     2 901b3f16 2be94e7e
#> 2     2     3 901b3f16 47a6e8ad
#> 3     3     4 901b3f16 94601709
#> # ... with 13 more rows
